sentences.english: B. That's fine. May be I should have boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，也許我喫水煮蛋算了。

sentences.english: Greg likes to eat boiled eggs.
Sure, i'd like a pineapple juice, also, a boiled egg and tea and toast, please.
sentences.chinese: 可以，我要一杯菠蘿汁，一個水煮蛋，土司和茶。

sentences.english: This new age mobile application Egg Timer will keep you roast tender and the smoke away.
sentences.chinese: 這個新時代的移動應用煮蛋計時器將讓您烤嫩和煙了。
這些水煮蛋很容易剝殼。

sentences.english: But there’s more to apps than cocktails and soft-boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 但更多的應用程序不只是雞尾酒和軟心煮蛋。

sentences.english: So your poached egg preference sets you apart from the hardboiled fans at home.
sentences.chinese: 常喫荷包蛋已經讓你遠離享用水煮蛋的樂趣了。

sentences.english: Boiled egg, Fried eggplant, Tomato, Cucumber, Coriander, Tahini.
sentences.chinese: 煮蛋，炸茄子，西紅柿，酸黃瓜，調味芝麻醬。

sentences.english: Useful invention makes boiling and poaching eggs very easy.
sentences.chinese: 讓煮蛋和蒸蛋變得很容易的實用發明。

sentences.english: Two eggs half boiled and portuguese sausage.
sentences.chinese: 二個半熟水煮蛋及葡萄牙香腸。

sentences.english: He will eat the yolk of my egg for me.
sentences.chinese: 白煮蛋的黃可以給他喫。

sentences.english: We want to have toast and boiled eggs.
Two eggs halfboiled and portuguese sausage.
sentences.chinese: 二個半熟水煮蛋及葡萄牙香腸。

sentences.english: It has the facility to boiled the egg in the spa water inside the building beside the fountainhead.
sentences.chinese: 用溫泉煮蛋的設備在源泉傍的大廈裏。

sentences.english: The mathematician is an impractical person who can't even boil an egg.
sentences.chinese: 那位數學家是個什麼事都不會做的人，連煮蛋都不會。

sentences.english: I always have a boiled egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我每天會喫一個水煮蛋當早餐。

definition: poached egg/egg fried on both sides
to soak cooked rice in soup or water/cooked rice reheated in boiling water
